title: Topic 001 Question 059
body: You encounter a large number of outages in the production systems you support. You receive alerts for all the outages that wake you up at night. The alerts are due to unhealthy systems that are automatically restarted within a minute. You want to set up a process that would prevent staff burnout while following Site
Reliability Engineering practices. What should you do?
options: Create an incident report for each of the alerts.
Distribute the alerts to engineers in different time zones.
Redefine the related Service Level Objective so that the error budget is not exhausted.
